specialization.title: Get Real with AI.
specialization.description: Hands-on workshops. Cool projects. Expert mentors. Join us and level up your AI skills.

activities.title: Want to know what we're up to?

executive.title: Executive Member
executive.description: Help us lead and organize events, workshops, and club activities. We're always looking for new executives to join the team.

active.title: Active Member
active.description: Join our workshops, classes, and projects. Get access to perks like mentor support, pizza nights, networking, job and conference opportunities.

collab.title: Collab With Us
collab.description: We're open to collaborations with other clubs, sponsors, and partners. Whether it's co-hosting an event or providing support, we'd love to hear from you.
